channel.description: The latest CVEs for Becton Dickinson & Co -- BD Alarisâ„¢ Point-of-Care Unit (PCU) Model 8015

item.title: CVE-2023-30561|2024-10-22T16:07:16.822Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20point-of-care%20unit%20%28pcu%29%20model%208015
item.description: The data flowing between the PCU and its modules is insecure. A threat actor with physical access could potentially read or modify data by attaching a specially crafted device while an infusion is running.
